item.title: [DISTRELEC-5570] DE // Search result page - Price notification
item.description:
Could you please add the following remark on top of the search result list.
The remark should only appear when the customers are logged in.
If not, the text and the gap should not be there.

DE:
"Kundenspezifische Preise werden auf Produktseite und Warenkorb angezeigt"
EN:
"Customer specific prices are displayed on productpages or in the cart

Position: 10px distance from Icons / 10px distance from search result list
Font Size: 10px
item.summary: DE // Search result page - Price notification

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deploy.
(Result attached)
Font size increased to 12px, as 10px was extremely small (hardly readable)
perfect thx.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5565] Wiederufsrecht - please change 7(sieben) into 14 (vierzehn)
item.description:
In the attached print screen you can see that in the check-out, at the last step, one needs to accept the Wiederufrecht statement

please change 7(sieben) into 14 (vierzehn) for DE
and 7 (seven) into 14 (fourteen) for EN

thanks

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please add a screenshot
Yes, I have read and hereby accept the Distrelec <a href="/cms/widerrufsbelehrung">cancellation policy</a>. I have at my disposal 14 (fourteen) days right of revocation.
fixed

item.summary: CH-OCI // WALLMEDIEN AG - Umlaute bei OCI

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Kunde mit Problemen
https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=swarovski-ch-ger@oci.distrelec&password=ni3IeTha&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=

Kunde wo es geht
http://test.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=bayer-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=ul7aeNgu&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=

Beim Longtext feht die das HTML Exncoding

com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.eprocurement.data.oci.DefaultDistSAPProduct.getItemLongtext()
-> desc = HtmlUtils.htmlEscape(desc);

siehe: com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.eprocurement.data.oci.DefaultDistSAPProduct.getItemDescription()
Soll ich das fixen oder kann das jemand von euch machen?

Hi Nabil,
The HTML encoding is missing on the longtext:
com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.eprocurement.data.oci.DefaultDistSAPProduct.getItemLongtext()
-> desc = HtmlUtils.htmlEscape(desc);

check: com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.eprocurement.data.oci.DefaultDistSAPProduct.getItemDescription()
I updated the encoding for the long text

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5490] Checkout - Step 1 alignment
item.description:
Issue
There is too much spacing in between the payment & delivery options. This leads to unnecessary scrolling and could disrupt the checkout process flow.

Requiremet

  1. There is too much spacing in between the payment & delivery options. -> This leads to unnecessary scrolling and could disrupt the checkout process flow. The spacing is not standardized for all rows.
  2. No line-breaks should be added. Text should be placed on one row.

Question: Shall we resize the payment-icons to look more similar regarding their size?

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please review.

Resized height of Delivery and Payment options.
But for Payment, icons are very different in size. (See Paypal row & icon), so here we can't have the same height for all row.

I'd recommend to resize the icons to have more consistency, and to be sure all rows have the same height.
And also trying to avoid the vertical scroll

  • i can resize the images in the code as well, if needed.

I will request the icons in the correct size. Could you let me know what would be the optimal height? and the maximal width?
In the meantime it would be nice to resize them in the code until I receive the adjusted icons.

Ok, for the moment payment icons height limited to 30px by code.

For the new images, I would say height of 30px for all. The width can be different because it does not affect the height of the rows. (Watch out it doesn't deform the shape of the image)
The height of 30 px - is this still a valid size if we have some descriptive-text of the payment methods? Please let me know I'll request the icons then.

Hi Rafael,
Yes. 30px is OK if we have some text above.
In fact, all icons are 30px height except the PayPal one, which is 48px, making that line higher than the others:

https://test.distrelec.de/medias/sys_master/h12/hba/8885700722718/LGO_paypal_min.png

Thanks
New Icon attached.

New logo uploaded to HP Q Hybris.
NOTE that this must be done in PROD as well.
Please upload the image also to P.
Uploaded!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5375] Navigate to a section ends in a 404 error
item.description:
Windows 8.1
Chrome Version 38.0.2125.101 m

http://www.distrelec.ch/ --> englisch

Go to mega flyout, Tools & Measurement, choose Screws, Dowels & Springs will end in an 404 page not found error.
item.summary: Navigate to a section ends in a 404 error

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The issue was that 62 attributes are not translated for English, but we expected in the response that this value is present and this has ended in an error.
I have implemented a fix that this error can not happen anymore and I have forwarded a list of the 62 attributes to Sam for translation.
